dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev in Astana just marked the 30th anniversary of Kazakhstan's Constitution during the flag-raising ceremony.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev in Astana just marked the thirtieth anniversary of Kazakhstan's Constitution during the flag-raising ceremony.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 4, President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev took part in the national flag-raising ceremony in Astana. President Tokayev noted that this year marks the 30th anniversary of the Constitution ' one of the strong foundations of Kazakhstan's statehood.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, he called it one of the strong foundations of their statehood, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, he called it one of the strong foundations of their statehood, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev noted that this year marks the 30th anniversary of the Constitution ' one of the strong foundations of Kazakhstan's statehood.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he emphasized that it's not just a document—it's the main principles their whole society is built on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he emphasized that it's not just a document-it's the main principles their whole society is built on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Constitution contains the main principles on which our society is built.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I love that he connected it to, um, large-scale reforms and the rule of law. It's like, guiding the nation step by step.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I love that he connected it to, um, large-scale reforms and the rule of law. It's like, guiding the nation step by step.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Guided by the spirit of the Constitution, we uphold the rule of law and order and implement large-scale reforms step by step.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And that turquoise passport he mentioned—such a specific detail—symbolizes unity for all citizens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that turquoise passport he mentioned-such a specific detail-symbolizes unity for all citizens.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are united by our turquoise passport, common aspirations, and unwavering belief in the creative power of reform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, common aspirations and a shared belief in reform. He even quoted a Kazakh proverb about unity under one flag.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, common aspirations and a shared belief in reform. He even quoted a Kazakh proverb about unity under one flag.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are united by our turquoise passport, common aspirations, and unwavering belief in the creative power of reform. A Kazakh proverb says: ˜Those united under one flag share the same spirit, and those walking one road share one destiny.'

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: "Those united under one flag share the same spirit"—powerful stuff. And he tied it to ethnic harmony under that sky-blue flag.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Those united under one flag share the same spirit-powerful stuff. And he tied it to ethnic harmony under that sky-blue flag.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A Kazakh proverb says: ˜Those united under one flag share the same spirit, and those walking one road share one destiny.' Under the sky-blue flag of our country, representatives of different ethnic groups live in peace and harmony.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Then he shifted to addressing military academy graduates, which is a tradition on the Day of State Symbols.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Then he shifted to addressing military academy graduates, which is a tradition on the Day of State Symbols.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President then addressed the graduates of military academies, who traditionally receive their officer epaulets on the Day of State Symbols.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, presenting officer epaulets to the best cadets under the flag. He called it a sacred duty, linking them to brave batyrs, you know, warriors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, presenting officer epaulets to the best cadets under the flag. He called it a sacred duty, linking them to brave batyrs, you know, warriors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It has become a good tradition to present officer epaulets to the best cadets under our sky-blue flag, which inspires and strengthens the patriotic spirit of our warriors. In such moments, every citizen deeply realizes that serving their native country is a sacred duty, and that they are the descendants of brave batyrs (warriors) who valiantly defended our Motherland.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That ancestral pride is huge—guardians of the border continuing those traditions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That ancestral pride is huge-guardians of the border continuing those traditions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The servicemen guarding the state's borders continue the proud traditions of our courageous ancestors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he wrapped it up with that hopeful note: "May our sky-blue banner fly proudly."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he wrapped it up with that hopeful note: May our sky-blue banner fly proudly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May our sky-blue banner fly proudly!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You can really feel how these symbols, um, bind past, present, and future for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You can really feel how these symbols, um, bind past, present, and future for Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's about building a Just, Safe, and Clean Kazakhstan, like he said—unity as the key to new accomplishments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's about building a Just, Safe, and Clean Kazakhstan, like he said-unity as the key to new accomplishments.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have one path, one goal ' to build a Just, Safe, and Clean Kazakhstan. Only by preserving and strengthening our unity can we achieve new accomplishments, Tokayev said.
